TypeSignature.Value: public class LinkButton : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl, System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler, System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinkButton extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl
Public Class LinkButton Inherits WebControl Implements IButtonControl, IPostBackEventHandler
public ref class LinkButton : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl, System::Web::UI::IPostBackEventHandler, System::Web::UI::WebControls::IButtonControl

summary.span: Displays a hyperlink-style button control on a Web page.

span.span: Displays a hyperlink-style button control on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [LinkButton 控件和验证LinkButton Controls and Validation](#ButtonControlsAndValidation) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用要创建在网页上超链接样式按钮控件。Use the control to create a hyperlink-style button on the Web page. 控件具有相同的外观控件，但具有相同的功能控件。The control has the same appearance as a control, but has the same functionality as a control. 如果你想要链接到另一个网页，当单击控件时，请考虑使用控件。If you want to link to another Web page when the control is clicked, consider using the control. > [!NOTE] > 控件呈现 JavaScript 客户端浏览器。The control renders JavaScript to the client browser. 客户端浏览器必须为此控件启用 JavaScript 才能正常工作。The client browser must have JavaScript enabled for this control to function properly. 有关客户端脚本的详细信息，请参阅[客户端脚本中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa)。For more information on client script, see [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa). 你可以创建一个提交按钮或命令按钮。You can create either a Submit button or a Command button. 提交按钮没有与之关联的命令名称。A Submit button does not have a command name associated with it. 该按钮仅将 Web 页面回发到服务器。The button simply posts the Web page back to the server. 默认情况下，控件是一个提交按钮。By default, a control is a Submit button. 你可以提供的事件处理程序事件以编程方式控制的操作执行时单击提交按钮。You can provide an event handler for the event to programmatically control the actions performed when the Submit button is clicked. 另一方面，命令按钮有与该按钮，如关联的命令名称`Sort`。On the other hand, a Command button has a command name associated with the button, such as `Sort`. 设置属性指定的命令名称。Set the property to specify the command name. 此选项，可以创建多个在网站上的控件，并以编程方式确定哪些控件被单击。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. 你还可以使用与命令按钮来提供有关要执行，例如，指定按升序进行排序的命令的其他信息的属性。You can also use the property with a Command button to provide additional information about the command to perform, such as specifying ascending order. 你还可以提供的事件处理程序事件来以编程方式控制的操作执行时单击该命令按钮。You can also provide an event handler for the event to programmatically control the action performed when the Command button is clicked. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 文本不是 HTML 编码之前它将显示在控件。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the control. 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控件语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## LinkButton 控件和验证LinkButton Controls and Validation 默认情况下，执行页验证时控件被单击。By default, page validation is performed when a control is clicked. 页验证确定输入的控件是否与全部通过指定由验证控件的验证规则页上的验证控件。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 若要防止发生页验证，将设置属性`false`。To prevent page validation from occurring, set the property to `false`. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples Visual Studio Web 站点项目与源代码是可用本主题可以附带：[下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192872)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192872). 下面的示例演示如何创建显示中的文本控件控制单击链接时。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that displays text in a control when the link is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写在自定义的方法服务器控制，以便它可以将文本属性设置为已分析的对象的文本属性，如果分析的对象是对象，或为空否则为的字符串。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it either sets the text property to the parsed object's text property, if the parsed object is a object, or to an empty string otherwise. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_linkbutton_addparsedsubobjectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_linkbutton_addparsedsubobjectvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_linkbutton_addparsedsubobject.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_linkbutton_addparsedsubobject.vb#2)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果在单击 控件后执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is clicked; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，执行页验证时控件被单击。By default, page validation is performed when a control is clicked. 页验证确定输入的控件是否与全部通过指定由验证控件的验证规则页上的验证控件。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 你可以指定 （或确定） 是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证时通过单击控件属性。You can specify (or determine) whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when a control is clicked by using the property. 若要禁止从正在执行的验证，请设置属性`false`。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. 此属性通常设置为`false`重置或清除按钮以防止在单击该按钮时执行验证。This property is commonly set to `false` for a Reset or Clear button to prevent validation from being performed when the button is clicked. 时的值属性设置为`true`，你还可以使用属性来为其指定验证组的名称控件进行验证。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation. 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以防止在发生的页验证。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent page validation from occurring. 请注意如何方法单独激活每个验证控件。Notice how the method activates each validation control independently. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[LinkButtonCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButtonCausesValidation/CS/linkbuttoncausesvalidationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LinkButtonCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButtonCausesValidation/VB/linkbuttoncausesvalidationvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控件被单击。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此事件通常用时与不关联任何命令名称控制，如提交按钮。This event is commonly used when no command name is associated with the control, as in the case of a Submit button. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件显示一条消息时控件被单击。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display a message when the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

.event class System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventHandler Command
Public Custom Event Command As CommandEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控件被单击。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此事件通常用时的命令名称，如`Sort`，与关联控件。This event is commonly used when a command name, such as `Sort`, is associated with the control. 此选项，可以创建多个在网站上的控件，并以编程方式确定哪些控件被单击。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 通过控件层次结构中的窗体中引发事件`BubbleEvent`。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件显示一条消息时控件被单击。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display a message when the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets an optional argument passed to the event handler along with the associated property.

value.span: 可选自变量传递给以及相关的事件处理程序属性。

span.span: An optional argument passed to the event handler along with the associated property.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定自变量，用于补充属性。Use the property to specify an argument that complements the property. > [!NOTE] > 属性通常是只使用时属性设置。The property is typically only used when the property is set. 属性补充属性，它允许你提供有关要执行的命令的任何其他信息。The property complements the property by allowing you to provide any additional information about the command to perform. 例如，你可以设置属性`Sort`并设置属性`Ascending`以指定的命令按升序进行排序。For example, you can set the property to `Sort` and set the property to `Ascending` to specify a command to sort in ascending order. 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定一个可选参数，进行了补充的命令名称控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify an optional argument that complements the command name for a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string CommandName { get; set; }
.property instance string CommandName
Public Property CommandName As String
public: property System::String ^ CommandName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the command name associated with the control.

span.span: Gets or sets the command name associated with the control.

summary.span: This value is passed to the event handler along with the property.

span.span: This value is passed to the event handler along with the property.
The command name of the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你具有多个控件在网页上，使用属性可指定或确定的命令名称与关联单击的控件。When you have multiple controls on a Web page, use the property to specify or determine the command name associated with the control clicked. 你可以设置与任何字符串，标识要执行的命令的属性。You can set the property with any string that identifies the command to perform. 然后，可以以编程方式确定的命令名称控件并执行相应的操作。You can then programmatically determine the command name of the control and perform the appropriate actions. 有关该命令的其他信息如`Ascending`排序顺序，可以通过使用指定属性。Additional information about the command, such as an `Ascending` sort order, can be specified by using the property. 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定的命令名称控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a command name for a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior.

span.span: Creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior.

returns.span: A that represents the control's postback behavior.

span.span: A that represents the control's postback behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建对象，表示控件的回发行为。The method creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior. 对象通常然后传递给方法，用于获取对客户端脚本函数的引用，调用时，会导致页回发到服务器。The object is then typically passed to the method, which is used to obtain a reference to a client-side script function that, when invoked, causes the server to post back to the page. 此方法主要由控件开发人员扩展时使用类。This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the class.

para.span: 您可以重写在派生类来修改按钮控件的回发选项，或单击该按钮时调用客户端脚本中的方法。

span.span: You can override the method in your derived class to modify the postback options for the button control, or to call client-side script when the button is clicked.

para.span: 一定要调用基类的方法，以便这些标准的回发选项进行设置。

span.span: Be sure to call the base class's method so that the standard postback options are set.

summary.span: Raises the event of the control.

span.span: Raises the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控件被单击。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此事件通常用时与不关联任何命令名称控制，如提交按钮。This event is commonly used when no command name is associated with the control, as in the case of a Submit button. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件以显示其控件被单击。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display which control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: Gets or sets the client-side script that executes when a control's event is raised

span.span: The client-side script that executes when a control's event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定时，会执行的其他客户端脚本控件的引发事件。Use the property to specify additional client-side script that executes when the control's event is raised. 为此属性呈现在指定的脚本控件的`OnClick`属性除了控件的预定义的客户端脚本。The script that you specify for this property is rendered in the control's `OnClick` attribute in addition to the control's predefined client-side script. 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定时，会执行的其他客户端脚本控件被单击。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify additional client-side script that executes when a control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[LinkButton.OnClientClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.OnClientClick/CS/linkbutton.onclientclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LinkButton.OnClientClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.OnClientClick/VB/linkbutton.onclientclickvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Raises the event of the control.

span.span: Raises the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控件被单击。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此事件通常用时的命令名称，如`Sort`，与关联控件。This event is commonly used when a command name, such as `Sort`, is associated with the control. 此选项，可以创建多个在网站上的控件，并以编程方式确定哪些控件被单击。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 通过控件层次结构中的窗体中引发事件`BubbleEvent`。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件以显示其控件被单击。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display which control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知控件来执行任何必要的预呈现步骤之前将视图状态和呈现内容保存到客户端。The method notifies the control to perform any necessary prerendering steps prior to saving view state and rendering content to the client. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以便在一个自定义中永远不会显示一个边框控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that a border is never displayed in a custom control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender/CS/custom_linkbutton_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender/VB/custom_linkbutton_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender/CS/custom_linkbutton_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender/VB/custom_linkbutton_onprerender.vb#2)]

.property instance string PostBackUrl

public: virtual property System::String ^ PostBackUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the URL of the page to post to from the current page when the control is clicked.

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the page to post to from the current page when the control is clicked.

value.span: 要从当前页时发送网页的 URL控件被单击。

span.span: The URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the control is clicked.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，这将导致页后，可以回发到自身。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which causes the page to post back to itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许你执行跨页面 post 使用控件。The property allows you to perform a cross-page post using the control. 设置属性时要发送到 Web 页的 url控件被单击。Set the property to the URL of the Web page to post to when the control is clicked. 例如，指定 Page2.aspx 会导致包含的页控件来发送到`Page2.aspx`。For example, specifying Page2.aspx causes the page that contains the control to post to `Page2.aspx`. 如果未指定的值属性，在页发回发到自身。If you do not specify a value for the property, the page posts back to itself. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在执行与服务器端验证的控件与跨页回发时，你应检查页的属性是`true`之前处理回发。When performing a cross-page postback with controls with server-side validation, you should check that the page's property is `true` before processing the postback. 对于跨页回发，页面以检查是 PreviousPage。In the case of a cross-page postback, the page to check is the PreviousPage. 下面的 Visual Basic 代码演示如何做到这一点：The following Visual Basic code shows how this is done: ``` Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load If Page.PreviousPage.IsValid Then ' Handle the post back Else Response.Write("Invalid") End If End Sub ``` 有关跨页发送技术的详细信息，请参阅[跨页发布 ASP.NET Web 窗体中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b)。For more information on cross-page posting techniques, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b). 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来执行跨页 post。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to perform a cross-page post. 当用户单击控件，在页发到指定的目标页的文本框中输入的值属性。When the user clicks the control, the page posts the value entered in the text box to the target page specified by the property. 若要运行此示例，你还必须在此代码示例所在的目录中创建目标页的文件。To run this sample, you must also create a file for the target page in the same directory as this code example. 目标页的代码是下一步的示例中提供的。The code for the target page is provided in the next example. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[LinkButton.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.PostBackUrlProperty/CS/linkbutton.postbackurlpropertycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LinkButton.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.PostBackUrlProperty/VB/linkbutton.postbackurlpropertyvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来访问从另一个页使用的一个值，已发布属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access a value that was posted from another page using the property. 此页获取已发布从前一页，并将其显示给用户的字符串。This page gets the string that was posted from the previous page and displays it to the user. 如果你尝试直接运行此代码示例，则将会出错，因为值`text`字段将为`null`。If you attempt to run this code example directly, you will get an error because the value of the `text` field will be `null`. 相反，使用此代码创建一个目标页面并将该文件放在与上一示例的代码相同的目录。Instead, use this code to create a target page and place the file in the same directory as the code for the previous example. 文件的名称必须对应于指定的值上一示例中的属性。The name of the file must correspond to the value specified for the property in the previous example. 当你运行上一示例的代码时，此页将在发生跨页发送时自动执行。When you run the code for the previous example, this page will execute automatically when the cross-page post occurs. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[LinkButton.PostBackUrlPage2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.PostBackUrlPage2/CS/linkbutton.postbackurlpage2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LinkButton.PostBackUrlPage2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.PostBackUrlPage2/VB/linkbutton.postbackurlpage2vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于4.0; 否则为。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示 ASP.NET 应的呈现方式 HTML 控件时控件被禁用。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为`true`，ASP.NET 呈现`disabled`属性时控件被禁用。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为`false`，ASP.NET 呈现`class`属性时控件被禁用。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see .

value.span: 上显示的文本标题控件。

span.span: The text caption displayed on the control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定或确定要在上显示的标题控件。Use the property to specify or determine the caption to display on the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控件语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定的标题上显示控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the caption that appears on the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
.property instance string ValidationGroup
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 为其控件组的控件回发到服务器时要进行验证。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证组允许您将在页面上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组都可以独立于其他页上的验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用属性来为其指定验证组的名称控件回发到服务器时要进行验证。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 此属性才起作用时，才的值属性设置为`true`。This property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 当指定的值属性，只会验证控件且是指定组的一部分时验证控件回发到服务器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果未指定此属性的值与属性设置为`true`，该控件发回发到服务器时，该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件进行都验证。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要进行的控件时验证控件回发到服务器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the controls that are to be validated when a control posts back to the server. 页面包含用于捕获从用户的数据的三个文本框和三个控件以确保用户未将一个文本框留空。The page contains three text boxes to capture data from the user and three controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank. 控制中的前两个文本框中为`PersonalInfoGroup`验证组和控件中的第三个文本框是`LocationInfoGroup`验证组。The controls for the first two text boxes are in the `PersonalInfoGroup` validation group and the control for the third text box is in the `LocationInfoGroup` validation group. 当`LinkButton1`单击后，仅验证组中的控件`PersonalInfoGroup`进行验证。When `LinkButton1` is clicked, only the controls in validation group `PersonalInfoGroup` are validated. 当`LinkButton2`单击后，仅验证分组中的控件`LocationInfoGroup`进行验证。When `LinkButton2` is clicked, only the control in validation group `LocationInfoGroup` is validated. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[LinkButton.ValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.ValidationGroup/CS/linkbutton.validationgroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LinkButton.ValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.ValidationGroup/VB/linkbutton.validationgroupvb.aspx#1)]
